meanings.definition: The quality or state of being prayerful.
meanings.sent1: Her prayerfulness was evident in the way she always took time to pray before meals.
meanings.sent2: The community admired his prayerfulness during the church service.
meanings.sent3: His prayerfulness was so strong that even the birds seemed to quiet down when he prayed.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with a sense of prayerfulness, as if the flowers themselves were whispering prayers to the sky.
meanings.sent5: The old church exuded a peaceful prayerfulness that enveloped all who entered.

meanings.definition: The act of engaging in prayer.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, she started her day with a moment of prayerfulness.
meanings.sent2: The family gathered together in prayerfulness before the big event.
meanings.sent3: His prayerfulness was so intense that he accidentally prayed for rain on a sunny day.
meanings.sent4: The whole room was filled with a tangible prayerfulness as they prayed for healing.
meanings.sent5: The quiet forest was a perfect place for moments of prayerfulness and reflection.
